Text.Page:
Listen, I need to get these furs back to Habere, but I don't want to leave the soldiers in the lurch.

I'm the best choice to stay and help, but my daughter needs the medicine. Would you escort one of my apprentices back to camp? She can take the furs to Balrug."Of course."

Thanks. The apprentice can give the hides to Balrug and he can get the medicine for my girl.

And tell him not to worry. I'll be fine and so will his little apprentices.
Craxan's saved my life many times. I'll do whatever I can to help his daughter.

Thanks for bringing back the apprentice, but where are Craxan and the others?

They're staying behind? Impulsive fool!

Very well. I'll head to town and do what I can for Craxan's child.
